alert.note: Alert for Custer; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 04 at 2:22PM MDT until September 04 at 2:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM MDT FOR CENTRAL CUSTER AND SOUTHWESTERN PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 222 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Custer State Park to 5 miles northeast of Buffalo Gap, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Keystone, Fairburn, Black Hills Playhouse, State Game Lodge, Center Lake, Mount Rushmore National Memorial, Horse Thief Lake, and northeastern Custer State Park around 230 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Keystone Wye. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
